## CreateEditorOptions interface

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface CreateEditorOptions extends Omit<DirectEditorProps, 'state'> 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [autoClean](./jest-prosemirror.createeditoroptions.autoclean.md) | <code>boolean</code> | Whether to auto remove the editor from the dom after each test. It is advisable to leave this unchanged. |
|  [plugins](./jest-prosemirror.createeditoroptions.plugins.md) | <code>Plugin[]</code> | The plugins that the test editor should use. |
|  [rules](./jest-prosemirror.createeditoroptions.rules.md) | <code>InputRule[]</code> | The input rules that the test editor should use. |
